titleStmt.title: A pleasant new song between a seaman, and his love. Shewing, though at the first in misery his time he spent he met his love at last, with joy and sweet content. The tune is Robin the devil.
titleStmt.author: Birket, Cuthbert.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "When Sol could cast no light ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
